verses.verse: וַיִּצָּעֵק֙ <WH6817> gathered themselves together אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the men אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> and went צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> northward וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> and said לְיִפְתָּ֜ח <WH3316> unto Jephthah מַדּ֣וּעַ ׀ <WH4069> Why עָבַ֣רְתָּ ׀ <WH5674> Wherefore passedst thou over לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> to fight בִּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֗וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְלָ֙נוּ֙ לֹ֤א <WH3808> without קָרָ֙אתָ֙ <WH7121> and didst not call לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to go עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with בֵּיתְךָ֕ <WH1004> thine house נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> with thee? we will burn עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> upon בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> upon thee with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> And Jephthah אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he רִ֗יב <WH7379> strife הָיִ֛יתִי <WH1961> were אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I וְעַמִּ֥י <WH5971> unto them I and my people וּבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> with the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> at great וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <WH2199> and when I called אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֥ם <WH3467> you ye delivered אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> me not out of their hands

וָֽאֶרְאֶ֞ה <WH7200> And when I saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵינְךָ֣ <WH369> not מוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> that ye delivered וָאָשִׂ֨ימָה <WH7760> [me] not I put נַפְשִׁ֤י <WH5315> my life בְכַפִּי֙ <WH3709> in my hands וָֽאֶעְבְּרָה֙ <WH5674> and passed over אֶל־ <WH413> against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> them into my hand וְלָמָ֞ה <WH4100> Why עֲלִיתֶ֥ם <WH5927> wherefore then are ye come up אֵלַ֛י <WH413> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto me this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> to fight בִּֽי׃

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <WH6908> gathered together יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> Then Jephthah אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> and fought אֶת־ <WH854> for אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> with Ephraim וַיַּכּוּ֩ <WH5221> smote אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> and the men גִלְעָ֜ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> Ephraim כִּ֤י <WH3588> because אָמְרוּ֙ <WH559> because they said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <WH6412> [are] fugitives אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> of Ephraim אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> O גִּלְעָ֕ד <WH1568> Ye Gileadites בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> the Ephraimites בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [and] among מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> the Manassites

וַיִּלְכֹּ֥ד <WH3920> took גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> And the Gileadites אֶֽת־ <WH853> מַעְבְּר֥וֹת <WH4569> the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> of Jordan לְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> before the Ephraimites וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> happened כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יֹאמְר֞וּ <WH559> said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <WH6412> which were escaped אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> and it was [so] that when those Ephraimites אֶעֱבֹ֔רָה <WH5674> Let me go over וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <WH559> said ל֧וֹ אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH582> that the men גִלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> of Gilead הַֽאֶפְרָתִ֥י <WH673> Ephraimite אַ֖תָּה <WH859> you וַיֹּ֥אמֶֽר ׀ <WH559> say לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> No

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> Then said לוֹ֩ אֱמָר־ <WH559> they unto him Say נָ֨א <WH4994> I beseech thee שִׁבֹּ֜לֶת <WH7641> now Shibboleth וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said סִבֹּ֗לֶת <WH5451> Sibboleth וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָכִין֙ <WH3559> [it] right לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> to pronounce כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> after that וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <WH270> Then they took אוֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וַיִּשְׁחָט֖וּהוּ <WH7819> him and slew אֶל־ <WH413> at מַעְבְּר֣וֹת <WH4569> him at the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <WH5307> and there fell בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִיא֙ <WH1931> he מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of the Ephraimites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> and two אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> judged יִפְתָּ֛ח <WH3316> And Jephthah אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וַיָּ֗מָת <WH4191> Then died יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֔י <WH1569> the Gileadite וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> in [one of] the cities גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead פ
וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <WH8199> judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> And after אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אִבְצָ֖ן <WH78> him Ibzan מִבֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> of Bethlehem

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֞וֹ שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> and thirty בָּנוֹת֙ <WH1323> daughters שִׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> [whom] he sent הַח֔וּצָה <WH2351> abroad וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> in thirty בָּנ֔וֹת <WH1323> daughters הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> and took לְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> for his sons מִן־ <WH4480> from הַח֑וּץ <WH2351> from abroad וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> And he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years
וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> Then died אִבְצָ֔ן <WH78> Ibzan וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> at Bethlehem פ

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <WH8199> judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> And after אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel אֵיל֖וֹן <WH356> him Elon הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <WH2075> a Zebulonite וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> and he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died אֵל֣וֹן <WH436> the oak הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <WH2075> the Zebulonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּאַיָּל֖וֹן <WH357> in Aijalon בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the country זְבוּלֻֽן׃ <WH2074> of Zebulun פ

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> judged אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> And after אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel עַבְדּ֥וֹן <WH5658> him Abdon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הִלֵּ֖ל <WH1985> of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִֽי׃ <WH6553> a Pirathonite

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֞וֹ אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> And he had forty בָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <WH7970> and thirty בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> grandsons בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> sons רֹכְבִ֖ים <WH7392> that rode עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> on threescore and ten עֲיָרִ֑ם <WH5895> ass colts וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> and he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> died עַבְדּ֥וֹן <WH5658> And Abdon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הִלֵּ֖ל <WH1985> of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֑י <WH6553> the Pirathonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֤ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּפִרְעָתוֹן֙ <WH6552> in Pirathon בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim בְּהַ֖ר <WH2022> in the mount הָעֲמָלֵקִֽי׃ <WH6003> of the Amalekites פ
